headline: Goldman Sachs Maintains Price Target on Amgen (AMGN) Before Key Trial Readouts
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) ranks among the Best Low Volatility Investments in December 2025. Goldman Sachs reaffirmed its $400 price target and Buy rating for Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) on November 25 ahead of two Phase 2 updates for the company’s obesity medication MariTide, which are anticipated by year’s end.
